entry.title: Newsletter #86
entry.content:
Hello folks! It’s #TechThursday at #namshi

Yay! Cirpo 2.0 got released. The new version is soo much lighter than the old one.. :)

Here is the list with awesome links to keep you busy during the weekend:

  • Top Tips to refine your backlog

  • First, Understand the Problem

  • The Original jQuery Source Code, Annotated by John Resig

  • Winner of js1k 2015

  • AngularJs2.0 first impression

  • A lesson from event driven UI developement

  • BEM 101

  • Git style guides

  • Developing a tabs component in AngularJs 2

  • Fixing the blank text problem

  • RQ is a small JavaScript library for managing asynchronicity in server applications.

  • Auto-formatting JavaScript Code Style

  • How Machines See the Web: Exploring the Web Algorithmically

  • What Story Does Your Code Tell?

  • Broadway: Infrastructure and testing helpers for creating CQRS and event sourced applications.

  • New in Symfony 2.7: Twig Profiler

  • The complete guide to rebasing in git

  • When is Dependency Injection evil?

  • Query your local network for Chromecasts and have them play media

  • A curated list of helpful material to get started with the second version of #AngularJS

  • I am powering a bank’s website using #WordPress. What security measures should I take?

  • China’s Great Cannon

  • What’s the hardest bug you’ve debugged? One of the programmers behind Crash Bandicoot gives his take

  • What is the full cost of your commute?

  • The Next Generation of Dense-storage Instances for EC2

  • What is the reason for performing a double fork when creating a daemon?

  • Baseimage-docker, fat containers and “treating containers as VMs”

  • The 500-mile email

  • Streaming JSON loading for Node and browsers

  • WebGL fundamentals

  • Advanced ElasticSearch + Meteor

  • PHP vs. Node.js: An epic battle for developer mind share

  • The lord of the rings analogy to programming languages

  • New StrongLoop Process Manager Features for Running Node.js in Production Including Docker Support

  • A math problem for 14-year-olds is stumping the world

  • Amazon EC2 Container Service is Now Generally Available

  • Experimenting with HHVM at Etsy

  • New – Cross-Region Replication for Amazon S3

  • Amazon Elastic File System – Shared File Storage for Amazon EC2

  • Generate release notes from closed issues and merged pull requests
